channel.title: Chen Zhang
channel.description: PhD Student - Computer Science - University College London

item.title: PhD life begins at UCL
item.description:
My new research life just began in Bloomsbury, London from late September.

Visit UCL CS website to find more about our department UCL-CS.

item.title: Welcome to Chenz.xyz!
item.description:
I am currently an undergraduate student with Hongyi the Mathematics Class, Wuhan University, China. Mathematics, Computer Science and Photography are all of my interest. And I am going to pursue a PhD in Computer Science after my Bachelor in Science(Mathematics).

My research interests are Computational Inverse Problems, Statistical/Machine Learning and Bayesian Statistics.

Check out the Wuhan University Website for more info on the most beautiful university in China - Wuhan University.
